item.title: Who Am I?
item.description: Oh heyy!! I’m Mohammed DAOUDI, also known by Hemouty. I’m a 22-year-old passionate electronics and embedded systems engineering student from Morocco, studying at ENSA-KÃ©nitra. I love C++, Rust, electronics, and other electrical stuff. More About Me From a young age, I’ve been fascinated by how things work. This curiosity led me to explore the world of electronics and embedded systems. I enjoy designing and developing projects that solve real-world problems.

item.title: STM32L432KBU Dev Board
item.description:
Introduction

The STM32L432KBU Dev Board is a custom development board designed around the STM32L432KBU microcontroller and the NRF24L01 wireless module. This board is ideal for low-power wireless communication applications and IoT projects.
